interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: [RIRE] Fork Tattoo Eyebrow Lasts up to 8 days! Long Lasting Waterproof Tattoo Eyebrow (02 Dark Brown)
Review Date: 2019/08/11
Store: RiRe
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.42 x 5.59 x 0.71 inches; 0.71 Ounces'}
Review Text: I really wanted to like it cause the ink that comes out is a steady flow and the forks are the perfect size BUT I got DARK BROWN and it left an orange stain on my skin for 2 days, so ridiculous
Review Title: Not true color
Rating: 1.0

reference_summary:
14 in 1 Combo Set Professional White Clear Pink Powder DIY Acryic Nail Art Decorations Kit Brush Cuticle Revitalizer Oil Pen Tools Rhinestones Sanding Buffer Forms Nail Tips Glue Set
RY
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RY', 'Item Form': 'Powder'}
First off, I could smell the acrylic the second I opened it. The powders had powder on the outside of the jars, the brush is the size of a Qtip and hard like it was used. The worst part that pist me off so bad, the glue was half gone and a solid chunk. I doubt I will get new glue from them so I'm screwed. (Stores were closed by the time I realized it). Other than ALL that I guess it's ok. Wish I would have gotten a better one for couple dollars more!
So irritating!!!
eBoot 100 Pack of U Shaped Hair Pins Bun Hair Pins with Box and Storage Bag, Golden (6 cm/ 2.36 Inches)
EBOOT
{'Brand': 'EBOOT', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Unit Count': '100 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 0.04 x 0.35 inches; 3.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '712971921153'}
At first I thought they were amazing but then I realized they kept slipping out of my hair because the second I would put them in my hair they would loose their bend and double the opening. Will be returning!!!
Not amazing like I hoped 😔
INOAR PROFESSIONAL - Argan Oil - Promotes Hair Control, Prevents and Repairs Split Ends, and Protects Hair From the Effects of Heat Styling Tools (2 Ounces / 60 Milliliters)
Inoar
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 1.57 x 4.53 inches; 3.52 Ounces', 'Item model number': '7898581080503', 'Manufacturer': 'Inoar'}
OMG! This stuff is AMAZING! The bottle was smaller than I expected but it is VERY thick oil so a little drop goes a very long way and it smells so so good. I put a little in after I straighten my hair so my hair is always moisturized
Soooooo worth it!!!!😍😍
2019 Hair Feel Finishing Stick, Broken Hair Cream Finishing Sticks Refreshing Not Greasy Small Broken Hair Shaping Gel Sticks Easy To Shape Hairstyle
AL'lVER
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 1 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
The product it’s self sucked. Didn’t hold my hair down for very long but the brush was awesome based on some other brushes
Pass!
AIKIMUSE Eyebrow Pen

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus**: The user remains dedicated to beauty and personal care, particularly emphasizing nail art and acrylic supplies. Their exploration into hair care continues, though recent concerns regarding product efficacy have emerged, especially with eyebrow products.
- **Quality Expectations**: The user upholds high standards for product quality, now accentuated by dissatisfaction from a recent eyebrow product that failed to deliver the expected results, leading to significant frustration over poor color accuracy and performance.
- **Frustration Tolerance**: A low tolerance for underperforming products is increasingly evident, highlighted by disappointment in products that do not meet their standards, contributing to their overall dissatisfaction with recent purchases.
- **Value Sensitivity**: While previously open to premium products, negative experiences have prompted a more cautious and discerning approach, focusing on consistent and reliable performance.
- **Material Preferences**: The user maintains a preference for quality ingredients and positive sensory experiences, demonstrating an ongoing concern about strong chemical odors and a search for natural formulations.
- **Review Patterns**: Actively engaged in providing detailed reviews, the user balances critiques with praise for high-quality items. Their latest feedback underscores a demand for accurate color representation and consistent performance, reflecting growing frustration with misleading claims and subpar offerings. 

This updated profile reveals the user’s continued focus on dependable quality and effective results in their beauty product choices.
